languages.text: {n}Черные глаза Бригадира расширяются. Под одобрительные выкрики из толпы он неуклюже поднимается и торопливо кивает.{/n} "Уж в этом можете не сомневаться, Лорд-капитан! Служу династии, слава фон Валанциус!"

{n}The Foreman's dark eyes widen. Shouts of encouragement can be heard from the crowd as he gets up clumsily and gives you a hurried nod.{/n} "I will, to be sure, Lord Captain! I serve the dynasty! Glory to House von Valancius!"
languages.original_text: {n}Черные глаза Бригадира расширяются. Под одобрительные выкрики из толпы он неуклюже поднимается и торопливо кивает.{/n} "Уж в этом можете не сомневаться, Лорд-капитан! Служу династии, слава фон Валанциус!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Foreman's dark eyes widen. Shouts of encouragement are heard from the crowd as he gets up clumsily and gives you a hurried nod.{/n} "You can be sure of that, Lord Captain! I serve the dynasty! Glory to House von Valancius!"

{n}The Foreman's dark eyes widen. Shouts of encouragement are heard from the crowd as he gets up clumsily and gives you a hurried nod.{/n} "You can be sure of that, Lord Captain! I serve the dynasty! Glory to House von Valancius!"

{n}The Foreman's dark eyes widen. Shouts of encouragement can be heard from the crowd as he gets up clumsily and gives you a hurried nod.{/n} "I will, to be sure, Lord Captain! I serve the dynasty! Glory to House von Valancius!"

{n}The Foreman's dark eyes widen. Shouts of encouragement can be heard from the crowd as he gets up clumsily and gives you a hurried nod.{/n} "I will, to be sure, Lord Captain! I serve the dynasty! Glory to House von Valancius!"

{n}The Foreman's dark eyes widen. Shouts of encouragement can be heard from the crowd as he gets up clumsily and gives you a hurried nod.{/n} "I will, to be sure, Lord Captain! I serve the dynasty! Glory to House von Valancius!"

{n}The Foreman's dark eyes widen. Shouts of encouragement can be heard from the crowd as he gets up clumsily and gives you a hurried nod.{/n} "I will, to be sure, Lord Captain! I serve the dynasty! Glory to House von Valancius!"

languages.text: {n}Los ojos negros del Capataz se abren de la sorpresa. Puedes oír gritos de ánimo desde la multitud mientras se incorpora con torpeza y asiente apresuradamente.{/n} «¡Lo haré, no lo dude, Lord Capitán! ¡Sirvo a la dinastía! ¡Gloria a la casa von Valancius!».
languages.original_text: {n}The Foreman's dark eyes widen. Shouts of encouragement can be heard from the crowd as he gets up clumsily and gives you a hurried nod.{/n} "I will, to be sure, Lord Captain! I serve the dynasty! Glory to House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos negros del Capataz se abren de la sorpresa. Puedes oír gritos de ánimo desde la multitud mientras se incorpora con torpeza y asiente apresuradamente.{/n} «¡Lo haré, no lo dude, Lord Capitán! ¡Sirvo a la dinastía! ¡Gloria a la casa von Valancius!».

languages.text: {n}作業長が黒い目を見開く。ぎこちなく立ち上がり、あなたへと急いで会釈する中で、群衆から激励の叫び声が聞こえてくる。{/n}「いたしますとも。もちろんです、ロード・キャプテン！王朝に仕えているのです！フォン・ヴァランシウス家に栄光あれ！」
languages.original_text: {n}The Foreman's dark eyes widen. Shouts of encouragement can be heard from the crowd as he gets up clumsily and gives you a hurried nod.{/n} "I will, to be sure, Lord Captain! I serve the dynasty! Glory to House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: {n}作業長が黒い目を見開く。ぎこちなく立ち上がり、あなたへと急いで会釈する中で、群衆から激励の叫び声が聞こえてくる。{/n}「いたしますとも。もちろんです、ロード・キャプテン！王朝に仕えているのです！フォン・ヴァランシウス家に栄光あれ！」

languages.text: {n}工头瞪大了黑眼睛。当他笨拙地站起身来，急匆匆地向你点头时，人群中传来了鼓励的呐喊声。{/n}“我一定会的，舰长大人！我愿为王朝肝脑涂地！荣耀归于冯·瓦兰修斯家族！”
languages.original_text: {n}The Foreman's dark eyes widen. Shouts of encouragement can be heard from the crowd as he gets up clumsily and gives you a hurried nod.{/n} "I will, to be sure, Lord Captain! I serve the dynasty! Glory to House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: {n}工头瞪大了黑眼睛。当他笨拙地站起身来，急匆匆地向你点头时，人群中传来了鼓励的呐喊声。{/n}“我一定会的，舰长大人！我愿为王朝肝脑涂地！荣耀归于冯·瓦兰修斯家族！”

languages.text: {n}Die dunklen Augen des Vorarbeiters weiten sich. Aus der Menge ertönen Anfeuerungsrufe, als er sich ungeschickt erhebt und dir kurz zunickt.{/n} "Das werde ich mit Sicherheit, Lord Captain! Ich diene der Dynastie! Gepriesen sei das Haus Valancius!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Foreman's dark eyes widen. Shouts of encouragement can be heard from the crowd as he gets up clumsily and gives you a hurried nod.{/n} "I will, to be sure, Lord Captain! I serve the dynasty! Glory to House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die dunklen Augen des Vorarbeiters weiten sich. Aus der Menge ertönen Anfeuerungsrufe, als er sich ungeschickt erhebt und dir kurz zunickt.{/n} "Das werde ich mit Sicherheit, Lord Captain! Ich diene der Dynastie! Gepriesen sei das Haus Valancius!"

languages.text: {n}Le contremaître écarquille les yeux de surprise. Encouragé par les cris de la foule, il se relève maladroitement et vous adresse un rapide signe de tête.{/n} « Vous pouvez compter sur moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Je suis au service de la dynastie ! Gloire à la maison von Valancius ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The Foreman's dark eyes widen. Shouts of encouragement can be heard from the crowd as he gets up clumsily and gives you a hurried nod.{/n} "I will, to be sure, Lord Captain! I serve the dynasty! Glory to House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le contremaître écarquille les yeux de surprise. Encouragé par les cris de la foule, il se relève maladroitement et vous adresse un rapide signe de tête.{/n} « Vous pouvez compter sur moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Je suis au service de la dynastie ! Gloire à la maison von Valancius ! »

languages.text: {n}Ustabaşı'nın koyu renkli gözleri açılıyor. Hantalca ayağa kalkıp önünde alelacele başını eğerken kalabalıktan yüreklendirme haykırışları yükseliyor.{/n} "Emin olun ki sürdüreceğim Lord Kaptan! Hizmetim hanedanlığadır! Von Valancius Hanesi çok yaşa"
languages.original_text: {n}The Foreman's dark eyes widen. Shouts of encouragement can be heard from the crowd as he gets up clumsily and gives you a hurried nod.{/n} "I will, to be sure, Lord Captain! I serve the dynasty! Glory to House von Valancius!"
